briefdescription.para: Get the name of the component.
Check if progress function needs to be called.

parameterdescription.para: number of units processed since last progress

simplesect.para: whether progress needs to be called

briefdescription.para: Turn the scheduler.

detaileddescription.para: Polls every component that might generate or complete work, and potentially runs one piece of available work.

parameterdescription.para: whether to only make progress on the core active messenger

briefdescription.para: Run the progress function.

parameterdescription.para: whether to only make progress on the core active messenger

briefdescription.para: Runs the scheduler until a condition is met.

detaileddescription.para: Runs the scheduler until a condition is met. This form SHOULD be used instead of "while (..) { runScheduler(..) }" in all cases of nested scheduler loops, such as during a barrier, in order to ensure proper event unwinding and idle time tracking.

parameterdescription.para: condition to turn scheduler until met

briefdescription.para: Register a trigger with the scheduler.
Register a trigger once with the scheduler.
Trigger an event.
Check if the scheduler has run, polling all components at least once.
Enqueue an action to execute later with the default priority default_priority.
Enqueue an action with a priority to execute later.
Print current memory usage.
Enqueue an action associated with a prioritized message. The action will be enqueued with the priority found on the message.
Enqueue a action associated with a prioritized message. The action will be enqueued with the priority found on the message.
Get the work queue size.

simplesect.para: how many units in the queue

briefdescription.para: Query if the work queue is empty.
Check if the scheduler is idle.
Check if the scheduler is idle minus termination messages.
Check for termination when running on a since node.
Executes a specific work unit.
Make progress on active message only.
Make progress.
A core VT component that schedules work generated from other components. The pieces of work waiting to execute may be prioritized, see src/vt/scheduler/priority.h.

detaileddescription.para: Tracks work to be completed, orders it by priority, and executes it. Polls components for incoming work.
